meanings.sent1: The bigshots in the company always make important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The bigshots at the meeting were discussing the future plans.
meanings.sent3: The bigshots at the party were the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: In the world of animals, the lion is considered the bigshot of the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The bigshots in the movie industry have the power to greenlight projects.

meanings.definition: Someone who is successful or powerful in a particular field
meanings.sent1: The bigshots in the tech industry have revolutionized the way we live.
meanings.sent2: She worked hard to become one of the bigshots in the fashion world.
meanings.sent3: The bigshots in sports always inspire the younger generation.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, the bigshots are the ones who top the charts.
meanings.sent5: Being a bigshot in science requires dedication and innovation.

meanings.definition: A person who is highly regarded or respected in their profession
meanings.sent1: The bigshots in the medical field save lives every day.
meanings.sent2: He is considered one of the bigshots in the culinary world.
meanings.sent3: The bigshots in education shape the minds of future generations.
meanings.sent4: The bigshots in art create masterpieces that stand the test of time.
meanings.sent5: Becoming a bigshot in literature takes talent and perseverance.
